title: new feature (not sure if its already implemented but i haven't seen it
body:
in the champions section on your profile you should be able to click on a champ and see your best worst and average kda for that champion so you would be able to tell whether your tilted / playing poorly by comparing your last kda with your average kda and seeing if it is higher or lower 
it doesn't sound to hard the match history is already there you just need a way to sort it

replies.body: there are already numerous websites that let you see that information.
there also WAS, not sure if the see , more stats button still doesnt work, but the see more stats used to give you info like that iirc
Would be very hard to compile and store massive amounts of data like that without having a secondary source
